content.text:
Here is a possible client-ready memo for referring unresolved customer grievances:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
MEMO

To: [Relevant Department Heads]
From: Customer Service
Subject: Unresolved Customer Grievances for Further Investigation

Please be advised that the following customer grievances remain unresolved and require further investigation by your respective departments:

1. Account #12345 - Billing discrepancy
   Referred to: Accounting Department

2. Order #67890 - Product quality issue
   Referred to: Quality Assurance Department

3. Complaint #24680 - Delayed shipping
   Referred to: Logistics Department

4. Incident #13579 - Website malfunction
   Referred to: IT Department

Kindly review these cases and take appropriate action to resolve the issues. Please provide status updates within 3 business days.

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
